column4: Hey guys? Neither Synaptic nor Add/Remove are working for me(At least for adding). Did I screw something up on accident?
is there any error message?
g1gaman_:Nope, it just asks me to reload the list, so I do, then I try again, and it asks to reload, etc
have you tried to add the program by using command apt?
I also can't seem to install the Adobe SWF addon thing in firefox, seems to be the same sort of thing. It finds the addon it needs, but when I click to install, it just doesnt work
I dont even know what that is. This is my 3rd day on Ubuntu
open terminal and type in: sudo aptitude install your_desired_program
gentlemen, where can i find the list file for 'locales'. apt doesnt dist-upgrade, sez: locales list file contains empty filename :(
Ah, ok, thanks. Is there any way to fix the Add/Remove and Synaptic though?
i think if add/remove doesnt work, then you will not be able to install anything from terminal, but at least you will know the cause of crash
E: Could not get lock /var/lib/dpkg/lock - open (11 Resource temporarily unavailable)
E: Unable to lock the administration directory (/var/lib/dpkg/), is another process using it?
dont run multiple apt programs at the same time
still doesn't help, same problem
close any program (except terminal) and type in: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get dist-upgrade
So type "sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get dist-upgrade" all in one line?
with Pidgin closed as well?
yes.
no, you can leave pidgin open
ok
but any other program should be closed
Ok, did it. Now what?
Any chance my settings could have just gotten messed up and changing them will fix it?
what happened when you did dist-upgrade?
